level.heading: Notification requirements.
level.text: An individual, business, or entity that utilizes a commercial guard dog shall notify the Mayor, in writing, as to the presence of the animal and shall provide contact information for the entity responsible for the animal and a 24-hour emergency telephone number.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 17-281
level.text: For Law 17-281, see notes following ยง 8-1841.01.
